In England, in the seven days to 29 May, there were 18,236 new confirmed cases (32.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 May, there were 13,292 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 37% (4,944 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 June is 3,926,154 (6,975.2 cases per 100,000 population).
